summary: This is an email containing a link to a Wall Street Journal article published on July 12, 2019. The article discusses the shift of public and investigative focus onto a longtime associate of Jeffrey Epstein following Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure whose arrest has prompted a shift in investigative focus towards his associate.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: The arrest of financier Jeffrey Epstein, which subsequently shifted public and investigative attention to his longtime associate.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested, an event that prompted significant media coverage.
Following Epstein's arrest, public and investigative attention shifted to focus on a longtime associate of his.
The Wall Street Journal published an article on this topic on July 12, 2019.
